Okay, before I go any further I just want to know that I'm not 
accusing anyone. I just need to know stuff. Just now, I found out 
that my e-mail adress has been hacked. Someone went in, and sent a 
message from me, to me. I was from minime_316, to minime_316. When I 
opened it, a virus came and now my screen is flooded with bright 
yellow ducks. This is no joke. If anyone knows anything about this, 
and remember I'm not accusing you, please send me a private e-mail to 
mjs@.... Thank you
